name: Corona Results Bangladesh
author: SynthiaSoft

sections.description:
We launching this plugin free of cost so that everyone from all over the world can use this plugin in their website Showing Corona Result of Bangladesh in their website. This is a completely free plugin just click below given link to download the plugin and also you may follow the given steps to install tine plugin in your website.
All Data Come From http://coronacase.xyz/
http://coronacase.xyz/ This Is our Own Server Ulr , We are Useing This link To provide Live Update oF corona Cases In Bangladesh
Service url: https://coronacase.xyz/api/

If this any modification require and if you face any problem please Inform us via email.

support@synthiasoft.com

CURRENT API INFOMATION

CURRENT API INFOMATION
Corona Case/API

API website: https://coronacase.xyz/api/

License: https://coronacase.xyz/api/license/

Endpoint: https://coronacase.xyz/

Privacy policy: https://coronacase.xyz/api/privacy-policy/

Please read the Privacy Policy of this API before you download and install this plugin in your website.

NovelCOVID/API

API website: https://github.com/NovelCOVID/API

License: https://github.com/NovelCOVID/API/blob/master/LICENSE

Endpoint: https://corona.lmao.ninja/

Privacy policy: https://github.com/NovelCOVID/API/blob/master/privacy.md

Please read the Privacy Policy of this API before you download and install this plugin in your website.
sections.installation:
Corona Results Bangladesh Plugin Installation Process
Step 1.

Download the Plugin from WordPress official Website.

Step 2.

Upload it in you wp-content/plugins directory.

Step 3.

Activate it from Admin panel.

Now you can display Corona Results Bangladesh any widget area of your Theme.

You can also use Short-code [corona_bd_result] .
sections.faq:
Can I add more style?

Ans: Yeas But you need manually edit.
